website_summaries.verdict: The HTC Vive is a comprehensive PC-tethered virtual reality system that supports both motion controls and whole-room VR.
pros: Includes motion controllers and external sensors for whole-room VR
cons: Tethered headset makes whole-room VR tricky

customer_reviews.title: Gamechanging technology
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely blown away by the depth this adds to games and even apps like google earth. Can't spend enough time on it. Was relatively easy to setup with a few drill holes, and not had any motion sickness at all with it. The Oasis is here :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's fun!
customer_reviews.text: Feels great, would have loved the headphone straps bundled with it that got a 4 star. You'll need to get the tripods separately.
customer_reviews.author: WickedWabbit

customer_reviews.title: Forgotten what real reality is like.
customer_reviews.text: If you want the best, buy this. If you don't want the best, buy any of the others. NB. The Pro doesn't really give you much noticeable difference other than wire free.
customer_reviews.author: Inky

customer_reviews.title: lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: fantastic product, easy setup and great fun playing games on steam
customer_reviews.author: craig

customer_reviews.title: Had for 3 days and one of the controllers completely ...
customer_reviews.text: Had for 3 days and one of the controllers completely died, spoke to HTC customer service and they said there's nothing going they can do, and to send it back for replacement or refund.
customer_reviews.author: Pogo

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for Christmas and cannot believe how good it is
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for Christmas and cannot believe how good it is, the set up is very easy even for a mid forties man with little or no computer knowledge. The games are very good value and many are free, the game play is stunning and I am sure this will be the future of gaming as the TV does not cut it after playing this for while. Just amazed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was described as very good quality but this quality is excellent may as well be brand new .
customer_reviews.text: Straight out the box it was very well put together everything was there for me little bit of dog or cat hair in the box but that's no problem i got lots of animals my self and know the pain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good expirience, display could have been better
customer_reviews.text: VR is a wonderful expirience!! Immersive, fun with very good tracking I take away 1 star because of the pentile display which makes the space between the pixels noticeable. I was mislead by the higher resolution and chose it over PSVR, only to find that in the end PSVR has almost double the amount of subpixels.
customer_reviews.author: E. Eleftheriades

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A excellent vr experience but £759 on vive site Rediculous prices like this are damaging it's development. Buy direct
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love the VIVE
customer_reviews.text: This is the future. I absolutely love the VIVE. I much prefer it over the Oculus due to the hand controllers and room scale offering a lot more immersion. It also has better games like Raw data and Onward which are both just mind blowing. You really feel like you are there on many of the games. Its the best piece of tech I have ever owned and so glad I made the jump. If you want to get into VR gaming , this is by far the best head set right now.
customer_reviews.author: dbinit

customer_reviews.title: This is the future!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Worth every penny. Afer three months, I still use mine everyday. Had a faulty trackpad on one controller, but had it repaired and back in about 9 days - which isn't great, but not as bad as a lot of people make out!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fiddly to setup, expensive and hardly any games.
customer_reviews.text: Its amazing on first use but the excitement dies down very quickly when you run out of things to play. After 6 months on the market there are still hardly any 'PROPER' games to play. Most of what's available are actual demos or glorified demos that can be completed in 1 or 2 hours. My opinion is to wait, in comparison you can buy the next gen ps4 PRO and the PSVR for the same price, which on release has more real polished games than the Vive has had in 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Hong H

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant product and VR is a fantastic way to play ...
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant product and VR is a fantastic way to play games or just explore new worlds and ideas. Can honestly say I've loved mine since purchase back in 2016. That said..dont buy from Amazon. The RRP is now (as of March 2018) £499.99 on the official Vive site and through various other suppliers. Shop around!
customer_reviews.author: A. Stasiak

customer_reviews.title: love this thing use it all the time.
customer_reviews.text: it's a wonderful bit of kit and while not perfect still blows anything else vr out of the water. feels surreal to use you have to try it to understand.
customer_reviews.author: A. R. McColl

customer_reviews.title: Only for brain surgeons.!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you are in I.T buy one, if you have a degree in electronics or engineering. Buy one , if you are normal and just want to play games , dont even think about it.!!!! Youre gonna need a nonths supply of mogadon and a dustbin full of camomile tea to get over the frustration of set up even before you get to navigate steam and its never ending password and authentication nightmare. Just go and buy a tin of needles and stick them in your eyes for fun instead and spend the 800 quid on a family holiday. Mines going cheap if you want it
customer_reviews.author: K. S. Bullock
